macro.name: AVALANCHE_CONNECT_STRING
macro.description: Required. ODBC Connection string for connecting to Avalanche database. You can obtain this information from Avalanche portal.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_USERNAME
macro.description: Required. Username for connecting to the database using the ODBC DSN.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_PASSWORD
macro.description: Required. Password for connecting to the database using the ODBC DSN.

macro.name: AVALANCHE_TABLE
macro.description: Required. Name of the table in Avalanche, the data will be written to.

macro.name: AWS_BUCKET_NAME
macro.description: Required. Name of the AWS storage bucket to pull the data from

macro.name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY
macro.description: Required. Credentials used to access AWS services.

macro.name: AWS_SECRET_KEY
macro.description: Required. Credentials used to access AWS services.

macro.name: AWS_REGION
macro.description: Required. Location where the bucket lies. Must be a region id for e.g. us-east-2, ap-south-1 or region name for e.g. US East (Ohio), Europe (Frankfurt). See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/Concepts.RegionsAndAvailabilityZones.html for a list of regions.

macro.name: SALESFORCE_TABLE
macro.description: Required. Name of the table or entity in Salesforce

macro.name: SALESFORCE_SANDBOX_MODE
macro.description: Required. Whether to connect to the Salesforce application in sandbox environment.
